draw() - Method in class de.cyzetlc.roadsystem.gui.GuiScreen
The `draw` method creates a BufferedImage, fills it with colored rectangles, draws a road system, and then displays the image on the screen.

draw(Graphics2D, int, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class de.cyzetlc.roadsystem.handler.RoadHandler
This Java function draws intersections and connections on a graphics object, with options to display nodes and various statistics.
drive() - Method in class de.cyzetlc.roadsystem.utils.roadtraffic.vehicles.Vehicle
The `drive` method in selects a random branch at the current intersection and moves the vehicle to the next intersection if there are branches available, while also checking for collisions with other vehicles.
